mapper.select: select i.item_id as itemId, b.user_id as userId, i.name as name, img.url as imgUrl, d.invoice_number as invoiceNumber, d.code as deliveryCode, b.price as price, c.name as customsName from Item i left join Customs c on i.customs_id = c.id left join Bid b on i.item_id = b.item_id left join Delivery d on i.item_id = d.item_id left join (select item_id, url from Image where seq = 0) img on i.item_id = img.item_id where b.is_success = 1 and c.id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into Delivery(user_id, item_id, invoice_number, code, status) values (#{userId}, #{itemId}, #{invoiceNumber}, #{code}, #{status})
